This image is to be used as the back cover of a book titled ```{{bookTitle}}```.
</image_purpose>

<design_requirements>
- Should complement the front cover design while maintaining visual coherence
- Must be formatted for A5-vertical format
- Should provide visual continuity with the front cover theme
- Can include additional story elements or continuation of the front cover scene
</design_requirements>

<technical_specifications>
- Format: A5-vertical orientation
- High resolution suitable for print
- Professional book cover aesthetic
- Consistent style with front cover
</technical_specifications>

{{promptText}}

Generate a professional back cover that complements the front cover design while providing additional visual interest and maintaining the book's overall aesthetic.
</output_requirements>
